dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.billing.FinancialCharge
dataStructure.description:
FinancialCharge represent a normalized aggregation of AtomicAppliedCustomerBillingRate so every AtomicAppliedCustomerBillingRate appears in exactly one FinancialCharge. This is critical for financial reporting.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: FinancialCharge

child.name: characteristicValue
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association FCAccumulatesACBRUsing

This association end is optional
child.label: characteristicValue

child.name: customerBill

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CustomerBillPresentsFinancialCharge

This association end is optional
child.label: customerBill
